mapper.update:
update TBL_EDUCATION
DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DROP_SCHOOL = #{isDropSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDY_GRADE = #{studyGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDY_SCHOOL_NAME = #{studySchoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TEACHING = #{isTeaching,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ATTENDANT = #{isAttendant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SPECIAL_EDUCATION = #{isSpecialEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_INFANT_SUBSIDY = #{isInfantSubsidy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_BOARDING_STUDENTS = #{isBoardingStudents,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_HIGH_SCH_GRANT = #{isHighSchGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SCONDARY_SCH_GRANT = #{isScondarySchGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SCONDARY_SCH_TUITION = #{isScondarySchTuition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_POVERTY_SCONDARY_GRANT = #{isPovertyScondaryGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_POVERTY_HIGH_GRANT = #{isPovertyHighGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_NUTRITION_PLAN = #{isNutritionPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_INSURANCE_PREMIUMS = #{isInsurancePremiums,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHERS = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONE_YEAR = #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TBL_EDUCATION set DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DROP_SCHOOL = #{isDropSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDY_GRADE = #{studyGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDY_SCHOOL_NAME = #{studySchoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TEACHING = #{isTeaching,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ATTENDANT = #{isAttendant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SPECIAL_EDUCATION = #{isSpecialEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_INFANT_SUBSIDY = #{isInfantSubsidy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_BOARDING_STUDENTS = #{isBoardingStudents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HIGH_SCH_GRANT = #{isHighSchGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SCONDARY_SCH_GRANT = #{isScondarySchGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SCONDARY_SCH_TUITION = #{isScondarySchTuition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_POVERTY_SCONDARY_GRANT = #{isPovertyScondaryGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_POVERTY_HIGH_GRANT = #{isPovertyHighGrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_NUTRITION_PLAN = #{isNutritionPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_INSURANCE_PREMIUMS = #{isInsurancePremiums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHERS = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE_YEAR = #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
